snippet: Former President Hosni Mubarak “knew everything, big and small” regarding the brutal response to protests against him last year in Egypt, a report says.
abstract: Report commissioned by current Egyptian government reveals that former Pres Hosni Mubarak knew everything about brutal response to protests against him in 2011, and had authorized crackdown against demonstrators; picture of Mubarak that emerges from findings seem to contradict accounts by his lawyers that he did not orchestrate repression or know about deaths.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MAYY EL SHEIKH

lead_paragraph: Former President Hosni Mubarak “knew everything, big and small” regarding the brutal response to protests against him last year in Egypt, a report says.

headline.seo: Mubarak Dictated Response to Protests in Cairo, Report Says
headline.main: Report Says Mubarak Dictated Fierce Response to Egypt Protests
headline.print_headline: Report Says Mubarak Dictated Fierce Response to Egypt Protests

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
